executable.title: Clustering Scalar Diffusion Segmentation
executable.description: This CLI module aims to segment the DTI lesion based on a series of cluster paradigm.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos da S. Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CNPq grant 201871/2015-7/SWE and CAPES

string-enumeration.name: dtiMap
string-enumeration.description: Choose the type of DTI scalar map that was added in the input and reference image volumes.
string-enumeration.label: DTI Scalar Map

double-vector.name: initMeans
double-vector.description: A first approximation for the mean value for each tissue class.
double-vector.label: Tissues Mean Value Guess

double-vector.name: meanGuess
double-vector.description: A first approximation for the mean value for each tissue class.
double-vector.label: Tissues Mean Value Guess

float.name: alpha
float.label: Alpha
float.description: Set the alpha paramters for the Sigmoid function lesion enhancement step.

float.name: beta
float.label: Beta
float.description: Set the beta paramters for the Sigmoid function lesion enhancement step.

integer.name: numClass
integer.label: Number of Classes
integer.description: Set the number of tissues classes desired to segment in the input image.

integer.name: numberOfIterations
integer.label: Number of Itereations
integer.description: Set the number of iterations to the MRF label refinement step.

integer.name: smoothingFactor
integer.label: Smoothing Factor
integer.description: Set the smoothing factor to the MRF label refinement step.
